mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Medicine, Second Year Class, 1944-1945
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Class of 1947. Identified (L to R): First row: Robert Whitehead Alfriend, Crescent Frank Balmenti, John Bayard Britton, Carl Ashton Broaddus, Jr., Robert Ludington Brown, William Knox Brown, Louis Herman Calisch, Edmond Madison Chitwood, Jr., David Alexander Christian, III, Herbert Augustine Claiborne, Jr., Wilford Anderson Hall Council, Jr. Second row: William Arthur Cover, Dorris Alvin Cunningham, Waverley Berkley Dashiell, Powell Garland Dillard, Ernest Malcolm Dixon, James Paul Elkins, Nathaniel McGregor Ewell, Jr., Claiborne Willcox Fitchett, Jaime Higinio Font, Robert Castleman Green, Jr., Richard Littleton Haines Third row: Eugene Augustus Hildreth, Jr., Emory Falcon Hodges, Jr., William Herbert Howell, Jr., James Barrett Jones, Thomas Allen Kirk, Jr., James Maurice Knopp, Henry Clayton Landon, III, William Andrew MacIlwaine, John Houston McClung, John Jefferson Mahood, Charles Theodore Michele Fourth row: Joe Elias Mitchell, Richard Allen Neubauer, Rea Blackwell Parker, Jr., Edwin Pearlman, James Andrew Pettigrew, Murray Benjamin Pincus, Glenn Hickman Richmond, Frank Marcellus Ripberger, Nathaniel Lancaster Rodgers, Eugene David Schwartz Fifth row: Cary Grayson Suter, John Sheffield Tennant, Columbus Downing Tait, John Davd Varner, Clyde Hartwell Ward, Benjamin Boissiau Weisiger, Charles Warren Whitmore, James Dwight Whitt, Morton Callowhill Wilhelm, Mortimer Lee Williams Sixth row: David Cole Wilson, Jr., Suzanne Hayward Worrilow, Alfred Yager, William Frederick Young
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
